samples.name: Overview
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the overview of display and manipulate large data with configuration options to component the way the data is presented and manipulated.

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the default rendering of the Grid component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component demonstrates the grouping feature of the Grid component. The Grid component has options to group the records based on the required column.

samples.name: Grid Lines
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component demonstrates the visibility of the grid lines that separates the rows and columns.

samples.name: Hierarchy Grid
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the hierarchical binding feature which helps to build multi-level parent child relationship.

samples.name: Clipboard
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows about copy to clipboard functionality.

samples.name: Context Menu
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows usage of context menu in Grid component. Grid has options to show the context menu when right click on it.

samples.name: Master/Detail
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows usage of master/detail in which the details of a Master Grid record, is viewed in a separate Grid(Detail Grid) by clicking the particular row.

samples.name: Paging
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how you can display the contents of the Grid in page segments using paging feature.

samples.name: Sorting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the Grid multi sorting feature using this feature grid rows can be sorted by two or more columns.

samples.name: Default Scrolling
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the usage of the horizontal and vertical scrollbars to view the exceeded grid content.

samples.name: Virtual Scrolling
samples.description: This demo demonstrates how to use Essential JS2 Grid to show large data view without performance degradation by rendering only required rows and columns.

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how to bind with local data source.

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how to consume data from remote data service.

samples.name: Custom Binding
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how to bind data using custom data binding.

samples.name: AutoWrap Column cells
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how the grid cell content is auto wrapped to show large cell content.

samples.name: Show or Hide Column
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component demonstrates the dynamic show and hide columns feature.

samples.name: Column Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows usage of template columns in Grid.

samples.name: Header Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the usage of header template feature.

samples.name: Stacked Header
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows usage of stacked header feature.

samples.name: Reorder
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows reordering columns features.

samples.name: Column Chooser
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how the column chooser feature can be used to shown/hidden dynamically.

samples.name: Column Resize
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how the column resizing feature can be used to change width dynamically.

samples.name: Column Spanning
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the usage of column spanning feature.

samples.name: Frozen Rows and Columns
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how the rows and columns can be frozen or pinned.

samples.name: Column Menu
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the usage of various column functionalities using column menu feature.

samples.name: Foreign Key Column
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component demonstrates the usage of foreign key column and performing actions such as filtering, sorting and editing in the foreign key column.

samples.name: Row Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the usage of row template feature.

samples.name: Detail Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the usage of detail template feature.

samples.name: Row Height
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the row height feature.

samples.name: Row Drag and Drop
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component demonstrates how the rows can be drag and dropped between grids using row drag and drop feature.

samples.name: Default Filtering
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the how to place filter bar row in header to filter grid rows.

samples.name: Filter Menu
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component demonstrates the way of filtering rows using menu, checkbox and excel filter UI.

samples.name: Search
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the content searching feature.

samples.name: Default Selection
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how to select row or cell through simple mouse down or keyboard interaction using selection feature.

samples.name: Selection API
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the perform selection programmatically.

samples.name: Checkbox Selection
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how the checkbox selection feature can be used to select grid rows.

samples.name: Default Aggregate
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how the row values can be aggregated and showed in column footer.

samples.name: Group and Caption Aggregate
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how the row values can be aggregated for each grouped items and showed in group caption and footer.

samples.name: Reactive Aggregate
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how aggregate values are updated while modify the data.

samples.name: Inline Editing
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows inline editing operation.

samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how to edit the grid rows using dialog template.

samples.name: Batch Editing
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how to perform bulk changes to the grid content using batch edit mode.

samples.name: Command Column
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows how to perform edit and delete records using command column.

samples.name: Default Exporting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Grid component shows the client-side exporting of the grid content to the Excel, Pdf and CSV formats.
